attribs.name: content_srd
attribs.current:
Traits

**Amphibious**: The chuul can breathe air and water.

**Sense Magic**: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

 Actions

**Multiattack**: The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

**Pincer**: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

**Tentacles**: One creature grappled by the chuul must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

attribs.name: languages
attribs.current: Understands Deep Speech But Can't Speak

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KHg7iFVia-AZa--lOsd_content
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KHg7wrJqYWLnOxZHTnm_content
attribs.current: The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KHg7wrJqYWLnOxZHTnn_content
attribs.current: The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the wolf doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KHg7wrJqYWLnOxZHTno_content
attribs.current: One creature grappled by the Wolf must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHg7iFVia-AZa--lOse_content
attribs.current: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KHg7iFVia-AZa--lOsf_content
attribs.current: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 10 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
